channel.title: My Experience on Nadia Humbert-Labeaumaz
channel.description: Recent content in My Experience on Nadia Humbert-Labeaumaz

item.title: Creator & Host
item.description: Description Launched a series of discussions to share insights into business and entrepreneurship as well as promote social entrepreneurs. In these series, I combined my business knowledge and experience with those of the interviewee to provide high-quality content and increase my guest’s visibility on various communication channels.

item.title: Founder at Time for a Change
item.description: Description Time for a Change is the first collaborative environmental literacy platform. We’re committed to offering people reliable information to help them understand environmental issues fully and become informed citizens and economic agents.

item.title: Business Advisor
item.description: Description Collaborated with a social enterprise to define its marketing strategy and business plan. The goal was to let this startup find its market and gain momentum. Achievements • Identified a relevant target segment and positioning to increase customer engagement.

item.title: Business Advisor
item.description: Description Helped an SME turn regulatory pressure regarding GHG emissions (NZETS) into opportunities for its clients (farmers and corporations). Achievements • Developed a strategic plan featuring an innovative solution leveraging farmer-corporation relationships to offset GHG emissions and benefit local communities.

item.title: Global Delivery Manager
item.description: Description Scaled up the engineering team of a French startup internationally. The goal was to keep high-quality standards and develop a meaningful collaboration between the distributed teams. Achievements • Collaborated with the product leadership and company executives to define the OKRs and strategic plan.

item.title: Senior Technical Program Manager • Engineering Lead
item.description: Description Led the transformation of a firm’s cloud platform (~40 people). It was critical for the company’s business strategy as it allowed the opening of new markets in Europe. Achievements

item.title: Tech Consultant & Auditor
item.description: Description Provided consulting services to help tech companies of all sizes and industries grow and address strategic, operational and technical challenges. It always started by participating in the company’s day-to-day activities and interacting with all its stakeholders.

item.title: Founder, Business & Technology Leader
item.description: Description After a few years in the tech industry, I started noticing some recurring needs not properly covered in the market. So, I decided to become self-employed and explore my hypothesis.

item.title: Creator & Leader
item.description: Description Created a community to learn and share insights into the programming language Kotlin while I was living in France: https://twitter.com/kotlinlyon To do so, I created partnerships with companies to host events and contacted the leaders in the field to set up the events.

item.title: Creator
item.description: Description Created a channel to share insights into software engineering: https://www.youtube.com/Crafties

item.title: Founder, Software Engineer
item.description: Description Developed an online free platform to manage invoices and help Honduran entrepreneurs through the related significant changes in their legislation. Achievements • Designed, developed and delivered a simple and user-friendly platform that abstracted the legislation’s complexity (i.

item.title: Project Lead • Technical Program Manager
item.description: Description Led initiatives for the French national electricity project Linky (~100 people). This countrywide project aimed to replace all the standard electricity meters with remotely operated ones. Achievements • Ensured continuous value delivery by fostering collaboration within the engineering unit (including the engineering managers, architects, and developers) and between relevant functions (e.

item.title: Team Lead
item.description: Description Led the qualification of a BioMérieux software project aiming to enable the validation and release of medical reagents batches at the end of the production chain (10 people team).

item.title: Biotechnology Engineer
item.description: Description Optimised the measurement parameters of highly strategic equipment for Sanofi Pasteur. This project took place in a high-stakes context for Sanofi Pasteur. It was attempted many times before, for several years, with no success.

item.title: Social Project Coordinator
item.description: Description Coordinated a social project (30+ people team) to renovate a school in Honduras. Achievements • Raised funds from 30+ sponsors and events. • Set up a team of volunteer builders and engineers.
